settings.html: Radiologists need powerful computing solutions that can deliver precision, accuracy, and speed. The Dell Precision 5860 workstation is meticulously designed to meet these demanding needs. With its exceptional performance and customization options, the Precision 5860 empowers radiologists to navigate the intricacies of medical imaging with confidence and efficiency. It is a robust platform for image processing, data analysis, and diagnostic tasks.

settings.title: Unparalleled Performance
settings.description: Effortlessly handle diverse tasks and experience rapid data processing with the Dell Precision 5860 Tower Desktop Workstation. Featuring potent Xeon W series processors, such as the W3, W6, and W7, and supporting up to 24 cores, this workstation offers generous DDR5 ECC RAM and versatile storage options. Applications run seamlessly, ensuring a streamlined workflow. Meticulously designed for exceptional performance, it enhances productivity, allowing focus on mission-critical assignments. The combination of robust processors, advanced memory, and storage capabilities makes the Dell Precision 5860 a reliable companion for professionals tackling demanding workloads with efficiency and precision.

settings.title: Precision Graphics for Radiologists
settings.description: Experience a visual breakthrough with the Dell Precision 5860 Tower Desktop Workstation, delivering remarkable clarity and uncompromising graphics performance. Tailor your experience by choosing between NVIDIA Quadro or AMD Radeon Pro, accompanied by Barco MXRT GPUs. Whether analyzing intricate medical images or undertaking critical diagnostic tasks, this workstation ensures unparalleled precision for radiologists and medical imaging professionals. The thoughtfully crafted GPU options enhance visual fidelity, making the Dell Precision 5860 Tower an ideal choice for those requiring superior graphics capabilities. Elevate your professional visual workflows with a workstation designed to meet the exacting demands of precision-oriented tasks, providing an immersive and high-performance environment for graphics-intensive applications.

settings.title: Customizable & Expandable
settings.description: The Dell Precision 5860 Tower Desktop Workstation offers an array of expandability and customization options, making it a versatile solution for your specific needs. With an emphasis on hardware features, this workstation allows you to tailor your system to meet your exact requirements. Whether you need to scale up your RAM for memory-intensive tasks or add additional storage for vast datasets, the Precision 5860 provides ample room for expansion. Its modular design ensures that you can adapt your hardware as your workflow evolves, ensuring long-term reliability and performance. From graphics cards to storage drives, the flexibility of customization is at your fingertips, empowering you to create a workstation that perfectly aligns with your professional demands.

settings.title: Reliability You Can Trust
settings.description: Dependability is the cornerstone of the Dell Precision 5860 Tower Desktop Workstation. Meticulously crafted with premium components and subjected to rigorous testing, it stands as a testament to long-lasting performance. Dell's renowned reputation for reliability seamlessly extends to this workstation, establishing it as a steadfast partner throughout your professional journey. The commitment to quality and durability ensures that the Dell Precision 5860 is not only a high-performance workstation but also a reliable companion, ready to meet the demands of your professional endeavors with resilience and consistency. Whether tackling complex tasks or navigating intensive workflows, this workstation remains a dependable ally, consistently delivering the performance and durability expected from Dell's trusted legacy.

settings.title: High-Performance Processors
settings.description: Indulge in top-tier performance with the Dell Precision 5860 Tower Desktop Workstation, featuring Intel's robust Xeon W series processors—W3, W5, and W7—supporting up to 24 cores. Engineered for exceptional multitasking efficiency and rapid data processing, these processors redefine performance standards. Radiologists find reliable support in this workstation, ensuring seamless operations and empowering them to provide precise and timely medical diagnoses with confidence. The remarkable processing capabilities of the Xeon W series make the Dell Precision 5860 a trusted ally for professionals navigating data-intensive tasks, setting a new benchmark for efficiency and performance in the realm of medical imaging and diagnostics.

settings.title: High-Velocity DDR5 Memory
settings.description: Enhance your multitasking prowess with the Dell Precision 5860, equipped with DDR5 ECC RAM that offers abundant memory options. Boasting a capacity that extends up to 2TB, this workstation provides access to an expansive memory reservoir. Radiologists benefit from the ability to effortlessly handle extensive datasets, manipulate multiple images simultaneously, and operate memory-intensive software smoothly, all without encountering performance constraints. The generous RAM capacity ensures a seamless and productive workflow, elevating overall efficiency for professionals engaged in tasks that demand substantial memory resources. With the Dell Precision 5860, multitasking becomes a streamlined and efficient process, allowing users to navigate complex workflows with ease and precision.

settings.title: Customizable & Expandable
settings.description: The Dell Precision 5860 Tower Desktop Workstation offers an array of expandability and customization options, making it a versatile solution for your specific needs. With an emphasis on hardware features, this workstation allows you to tailor your system to meet your exact requirements. Whether you need to scale up your RAM for memory-intensive tasks or add additional storage for vast datasets, the Precision 5860 provides ample room for expansion. Its modular design ensures that you can adapt your hardware as your workflow evolves, ensuring long-term reliability and performance. From graphics cards to storage drives, the flexibility of customization is at your fingertips, empowering you to create a workstation that perfectly aligns with your professional demands.

settings.title: Elevating Radiology Excellence with NVMe M.2 SSDs
settings.description: For radiologists requiring a robust computing solution, the Dell Precision 5860 workstation, equipped with NVMe M.2 SSDs, stands as the ideal choice. Offering essential speed, responsiveness, and reliability, this workstation addresses the demanding workloads of medical imaging professionals. The NVMe M.2 SSDs not only provide accelerated performance but also enhance efficiency and effectiveness in the radiologist's workflow. With swift data access and dependable computing power, the Dell Precision 5860 ensures that radiologists can navigate their tasks seamlessly, enabling them to deliver the highest standard of care to patients. This workstation represents a pivotal tool in the medical field, prioritizing performance and reliability to empower radiologists in their critical work.

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.description:
The Dell 5860 Workstation Tower features a compact design, measuring efficiently, with dimensions and weight optimized for workspace versatility.

1. Height: 414mm (16.29") / 417.9 mm (16.45") with rubber-foot protruding

2. Width: 172.6 mm (6.79") / 176.5 mm (6.94") with rubber-foot protruding

3. Depth: 429.6 mm (16.9") / 452.1 mm (17.79") with lock-structure protruding

Weight: 31.7 lbs (14.4 kg)

settings.title: Front View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
The Dell 5860 Workstation Tower is equipped with a versatile array of ports, ensuring seamless connectivity for diverse professional needs.

1. Lockable drive bays

2. Optional optical drive 

3. Power toggle button

4. Universal audio port

5. USB 3.2 Gen 1 (5gb/s) Type A (x2)

6. USB 3.2 Gen 2 (10gb/s) Type C (x2), one with PowerShare

7. SD 4.0 card reader

8. Lockable, tool-less side panel, intrusion detection

9. Breathable front bezel

settings.title: Rear View Ports & Slots
settings.description:
The Dell 5860 Workstation Tower is equipped with a versatile array of ports, ensuring seamless connectivity for diverse professional needs.

10. Power cord connector

11. Mouse port (optional)

12. Keyboard port (optional)

13. Audio line out

14. Optional: Serial 

15. RJ45 (1Gb), RJ45 (10Gb)

16. USB 3.2 Gen 2 (10Gb/s) Type C (x3), USB 3.2 Gen 1 (5Gb/s) Type A (x3)

17. Expansion card slots (x5)

18. Easy access for expansion slots

settings.title: Dimensions & Weight
settings.content:
The Dell 5860 Workstation Tower features a compact design, measuring efficiently, with dimensions and weight optimized for workspace versatility.

1. Height: 414mm (16.3") / 418mm (16.45") with rubber-foot protruding

2. Width: 172.6 mm (6.8") / 176.5 mm (6.94") with rubber-foot protruding

3. Depth: 429.6 mm (16.9") / 452 mm (17.8") with lock-structure protruding

Weight: Maximum: 21.7 kg (47.8 lb), Minimum: 14.4 kg (31.7 lb)

settings.title: Monitors.com Exclusive Offer
settings.content:
When you purchase from Monitors.com, you not only receive a top-tier workstation but also benefit from our dedication to value and service. We understand the unique needs of healthcare professionals, and that's why we offer:
Advanced Hot Swap: Our Hot Swap capabilities ensure you can seamlessly switch out components without workflow disruption, guaranteeing uninterrupted productivity.

Next Business Day Standard Replacement: Count on our swift replacement service to keep your workstation running smoothly, minimizing downtime.

Free Shipping & Fast Delivery: We respect your time, offering free shipping and lightning-fast delivery to get you started with your workstation without delay.

Dedicated Support Team: Our team of experts is readily available to address any inquiries or issues, making your journey from purchase to setup as seamless as possible.

Competitive Pricing: At Monitors.com, we're committed to delivering exceptional value. You'll find our products competitively priced to fit comfortably within your budget.

Customer Satisfaction: Your contentment is our top priority, and we're dedicated to ensuring you're thrilled with your purchase. We're here to assist you at every step.

Invest in a Monitors.com workstation for not just top-tier hardware but a partnership committed to your success.
